displayName.text: Apollo Chiropractic PC: Andrew Dube, DC

formattedAddress: 304 W 117th St, New York, NY 10026, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Apollo Chiropractic PC: Andrew Dube, DC

adrFormatAddress: 304 W 117th St, New York, NY 10026-1573, USA

originalText.text:
I rarely review anything, unless it's the best.
That staff at Apollo Chiropractic is first rate in two significant and rare ways: complete competency and professionalism while also creating an environment of a family. This is so rare in modern medicine.
Dr. Dube is a master at his craft and has, literally, saved my ability to walk without pain. He's also a witty, bright, lovely man.
Carmen, Dr. Dube's stellar office manager, is one of the kindest and most patient people I've met in New York.
I can't say enough good things about Apollo Chiropractic.
They do healing the old fashioned way: they take their time and work with great personal care.

originalText.text: I was having trouble with my right shoulder and neck but kept thinking it would just clear up with some stretches and exercise. But I wasn’t doing those often either. I finally went in, got an adjustment, and feel much better! I was reminded to stick with a routine of stretching to help prevent the situation from reoccurring. I felt well taken care of. The doctor was kind, considerate, and communicative.

originalText.text: I'm very glad I chose this practice everyone's nice and very helpful Dr. Dube was excellent my pain was relieved. Great place to get treatment!

text.text: I'm very glad I chose this practice everyone's nice and very helpful Dr. Dube was excellent my pain was relieved. Great place to get treatment!

originalText.text: Can’t say enough good things about Apollo Chiropractic! The staff are always friendly and caring towards their patients. Dr. Dube is a personable, skillful chiropractor. Not only does he eliminate my back pain with each visit, but he checks in about overall well-being - physically and mentally when it comes to stress, etc. He makes recommendations to support your health beyond follow ups suggesting yoga and stretching, stress reduction, working out, etc. Carmen at the front desk is wonderful also and supports really well with insurance logistics. Can’t recommend enough.

Not only does he eliminate my back pain with each visit, but he checks in about overall well-being - physically and mentally when it comes to stress, etc. He makes recommendations to support your health beyond follow ups suggesting yoga and stretching, stress reduction, working out, etc. Carmen at the front desk is wonderful also and supports really well with insurance logistics. Can’t recommend enough.

originalText.text: I have been a patient for 2 years and am very happy with the care and personal attention I receive from Dr. Dube and his staff, especially, Carmen. I highly recommend!
